title: VaultCordAdv
author: VaultCordAdv
created_time: November 07, 2023, 06:07:48 PMLast edit: July 20, 2024, 02:59:33 PM by VaultCordAdv
content: VaultCord is a highly designed Discord bot, that allows you to backup your server members, channels, roles, etc with a simple click.VaultCord has many features including:View member's locationVerification logsServer backup (messages, etc)Blacklist user, IP, locationAutomatic scheduled backupsAlternate account detectionAnd much more.Keep your Discord server safe today at https://Vaultcord.comUPDATE: You can now get FREE PAID 3 DAY KEY with Linkvertise. Go to our dashboard here and click the Green button for FREE. Complete a few advertisements and get free 3 days each time you do that!https://imgur.com/a/VM5qGu7Check out our Discord, and Telegram Discord for paying with different methods, or to talk other VaultCord users.Discord: https://vaultcord.com/discordTelegram: https://t.me/vltcord

comments.author: Danydee
comments.body: It is legal to access users locations ??I see you're repeatedly writing (discor) instead of (discord), it is for hiding on the web referencing ??

comments.author: WhyFhy
comments.body: Quote from: Danydee on November 08, 2023, 01:44:04 AM It is legal to access users locations ??I see you're repeatedly writing (discor) instead of (discord), it is for hiding on the web referencing ?? "Working to keep people safe from Discore unfair TOS."Odds are. I de believe channel owners that are devs too can do whatever with data tbh.  Ip gives location, allows for blacklisting alts ECT... Most devs can script this stuff up all day and use it. It's all masked to masses though. And if you invite that bot to another server.... More data.Making a pitch to a community like this for a service like this is kinda counter intuitive imo. Vaultcord has major competitors though good luck! I've been out of discords loop for about 6 months though so I may not be up to speed on current tos.

comments.author: VaultCordAdv
comments.body: Quote from: Danydee on November 08, 2023, 01:44:04 AM It is legal to access users locations ??I see you're repeatedly writing (discor) instead of (discord), it is for hiding on the web referencing ?? Yes it is legal as long as people aren't using their location to dox/swat them. And that won't happen as we only give the estimated location of them for example their state/country. We do not provide IP addresses instead we have hash address so if you already have the persons IP address you can match them together if someone is trying to bypass the alternate account detection feature.I don't remember exactly why I have it as "Discore" instead of "Discord" I will see if I can fix that right now.
